game.name: Dark Dungeon Feminized
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: This FPS game has dark and beautiful art style. A tragic accident turns the strict laboratory into a dark dungeon. You are trying to escape from here with wisdom and strategy, and discover its unknown dark secrets.（Has Customizable female villain with costume damage）
game.shortDescriptionEn: This FPS game has dark and beautiful art style. A tragic accident turns the strict laboratory into a dark dungeon. You are trying to escape from here with wisdom and strategy, and discover its unknown dark secrets.（Has Customizable female villain with costume damage）
